entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023
